comments.body: license_file is missing as used here: https://github.com/bgruening/conda_r_skeleton_helper/blob/master/extra.yaml
I don't see any license file included in rjags_4-6.tar.gz. What should one include then?

@bgruening Could you elaborate a bit on what is missing? I looked at random R package at conda-forge (https://github.com/conda-forge/r-survey-feedstock/blob/master/recipe/meta.yaml), and that doesn't have a license_file entry either.
@bgruening Solved it. You linked to the wrong file which left me quite confused :-)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@  license: GPL (== 2)
  summary: Interface to the JAGS MCMC library.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'  # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-2'  # [win]
